DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this proposal is to examine whether endogenous GIP and exogenous GIP alone and in combination with insulin affect gastric emptying (GE), appetite, energy intake, energy expenditure (EE) and plasma levels of triglycerides (TAG), free fatty acids FFA) and glycerol in man.
DOC.brief_title: Glucose-dependent Insulinotropic Polypeptide (GIP) and Lipid Metabolism
DOC.criteria: Informed oral and written consent Caucasians over the age of 18 years Normal 75 g oral glucose tolerance test (OGTT) Normal blood haemoglobin concentration Normal plasma lipid profile Firstdegree relatives with diabetes and familial hypertriglyceridemia
